This occurs because of a wrong root edit part. I changed it to 
ScalableFreeformRootEditPart.

The print system should handle such case or it should be better documented.

The PrintGraphicalViewerOperation requires a viewer with a Layer that has a 
PRINTABLE_LAYERS key. This has been updated in the documentation.

Dan, other RootEditParts should support the PRINTABLE_LAYERS request.  Please 
add support for them.

Added a ScalableRootEditPart that supports printing and scaling.  Other root
edit parts also support printing.
